dependencies.name: libGpG-Error
dependencies.command: tar jxvf tmp.tar.bz2 && cd libgpg-error-1.50 && ./configure --prefix={{projectVendors}}/{{name}} --includedir={{projectVendors}}/{{name}}/{{includes}} --libdir={{projectVendors}}/{{name}}/{{libs}} --enable-install-gpg-error-config --enable-static --disable-shared && make && make install && cd ../

dependencies.name: libGcrypt
dependencies.command: tar jxvf tmp.tar.bz2 && cd libgcrypt-1.11.0 && CPPFLAGS='-I{{projectVendors}}/libGpG-Error/{{includes}}' LDFLAGS='-L{{projectVendors}}/libGpG-Error/{{libs}}' ./configure --prefix={{projectVendors}}/{{name}} --includedir={{projectVendors}}/{{name}}/{{includes}} --libdir={{projectVendors}}/{{name}}/{{libs}} --with-gpg-error-prefix={{projectVendors}}/libGpG-Error --enable-static --disable-shared && make && make install && cd ../
